content: Hello, I'm interested in your logo design gig.
Hi there! For quicker responses, I sometimes use WhatsApp to chat.
That sounds good. Can I have your WhatsApp number?
I'll be waiting for your message off Fiverr.
Also, can we discuss some project details on WhatsApp?
Absolutely, we can finalize details there.
Perfect, I'll send the files via email as well.
